name: Mad Carnage
overview: Follow John Carnage in his post-apocalyptic adventure in the world of Mad Carnage, created in collaboration with Evan Currie, a bestselling sci-fi novelist! In the world after the Great War, you will take control of intimidating petrol beasts, each with their own unique weapons and gameplay mechanics. Upgrade your cars, then battle it out in Campaign mode or on one of the 8 Custom Game maps! Invite a friend for local Multiplayer versus! Can YOU survive the Mad Carnage? Game features: • Engaging strategy gameplay • Advanced tactical challenges demanding flexibility • Immersive storyline, created by a best-selling sci-fi novelist • Customizable upgrade system • A 20-level Single Player Campaign • 8 local Multiplayer maps for either 2 players, or practice against an AI
